properties.name: minlength
properties.desc: The minimum length of characters the textbox should accept.

properties.name: maxlength
properties.desc: The maximum length of characters the textbox should accept.

properties.name: min-value
properties.desc: The minimum value the textbox can accept in case of numeric types.

properties.name: max-value
properties.desc: The maximum value the textbox can accept in case of numeric types.

properties.name: step
properties.desc: The incremental step for numeric types.

properties.name: datatype
properties.desc: The type of the textbox. Possible values are 'text', 'password', 'number', 'email'.

properties.name: minlength-err-message
properties.default: Length should not be less than {minlength} characters.
properties.desc: The default min length error message.

properties.name: maxlength-err-message
properties.default: Length should not be greater than {maxlength} characters.
properties.desc: The default max length error message.
